/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. A black car can be seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a comprehensive view of the cityscape, capturing the essence of urban life in Beijing.
